wikipedia_page.main: Gary Jordan (unknown – 22 April 2018) was an English professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s and 1970s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, and at club level for Featherstone Rovers (Heritage № 420) and Castleford (Heritage № 529) as a wing or centre, i.e. number 2 or 5, or, 3 or 4.
